name: @zthun/works.vault
description: A zthunworks microservice that manages the system vault configurations.
author: Anthony Bonta

scripts.docker:publish: docker push zthun/works.vault:latest && docker push zthun/works.vault:$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")
scripts.docker:build: npm pack && docker build . -t zthun/works.vault:latest -t zthun/works.vault:$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")
